summary: In 2010, paranormal investigators tried to film Richard Speck's ghost at the site of his heinous killing spree. The victims' families have finally released the footage that documents their last days.
cast: Steve Bencich|Tony Besson|Hayley Derryberry|Chance Harlem Jr.|Mike Holley|Jennifer Robyn Jacobs|Adam LaFramboise|Nancy Leopardi|David Lindmark|Jackie Moore|Chris Serafin|Jim Shipley
keywords: ghost|found footage|talking to the camera|looking at the camera|no survivors
title: 100 Ghost Street: The Return of Richard Speck
